Usage imbued into a weapon ikon

By channeling your divinity into a creature along with a strike, you can disrupt their ability to recover. The imbued ikon gains the following ability.

Immanence When you successfully damage an enemy with the ikon, a marking appears around the wound, painted in the red of mortal blood and the gold of divine ichor. When the target would regain Hit Points, such as from a healing effect or an ability like fast healing or regeneration, it must attempt a @Check[will|against:exemplar] save against your class DC to determine the effects, and then the marking fades. The marking otherwise fades after 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature regains the full number of Hit Points that would be healed.

Success The creature regains only half the number of Hit Points as the contradictory energies swirl within it.

Failure The creature doesn't regain any Hit Points.

Critical Failure The creature loses half the Hit Points they would have been healed.
